events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your online store but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been classified under the refund cluster since the customer requests money back.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah Thompson for further assistance regarding the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket order.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the item is unused and in the original packaging?
Thank you for your help. My order number is 4598231, and yes, the jacket has never been worn and is still in its original packaging.
We have processed your refund request and it will be credited to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and processing my refund promptly. I appreciate the efficient support.
The refund process for order 4598231 has been successfully completed and the case is now resolved.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was confirmed received and no further questions were raised, this case has now been closed.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback about the refund process and overall support experience.
